main event: Multiple UFO sightings reported across the Northeastern U.S. on December 5, 1957.
interesting points: Reports varied between 2:23 a.m. and 6:00 a.m.,Some observers described a round object with a burning trail.,Control tower operators and civilian observers were among the witnesses.,Some sightings indicated the object traveled on a straight course and displayed characteristics similar to meteorites.,No photographs were included in the reports.
sighted object: round object with a burning trail
